The following null hypotheses will be tested at 0.05 level of
signifcance: 

1. There is no significant difference in the pre-intervention and post-intervention ATMI scores  of the control group. 

2. There is no significant difference in the pre-intervention and post-intervention ATMI scores  of the experimental  group. 

3. There is no significant difference in the post-intervention ATMI scores of the control group and the experimental group. 

4. There is no significant difference in the post-intervention ATMI scores of the male and female respondents in the experimental group.
